settings.name: Day or night selection
settings.description: Select if you want to extract day or night positions from your dataset. Leave unselected to retain the full dataset with day/night annotations.

options.displayText: From sunset to sunrise (night). Timing can be adapted below.
From sunrise to sunset (day). Timing can be adapted below.

settings.name: Sunrise adaption time
settings.description: Select how many minutes before (negative values) or after (positive values) sunrise you want to define the transition between night and day.

settings.name: Sunset adaption time
settings.description: Select how many minutes before (negative values) or after (positive values) sunset you want to define the transition between day and night.
